sentence.idiomatic: Don't laugh, be careful not to spit out your food.
Something smells so good, did you spray on perfume?
Water sprayed into my ear, what should I do?
Computers are really useful, you can look up anything with them.
Learning Chinese will be useful for working in China.
The sun is so strong, will putting on sunscreen help?
Learning something is always better than learning nothing.
Although the salary for this job is low, it's a lot better than staying at home.
Even if it tastes bad you should still eat a little, it's always better than going hungry.
Lately he is always working overtime, we seldom meet.
She is always saying she wants to lose weight, but she eats even more than we do.
How come you're always following me?
Your feet really stink.
I was sweating a lot today, I really stink.
You stink. Spraying on perfume won't help either.
Are you wearing cologne?
No, it's antiperspirant.
Do you sweat a lot?
Yes. If I don't use antiperspirant, I stink.
Does it work?
It's not bad, but it is a little pricey.
How much is it?
A small one is 30 to 40 RMB.
Huh?
Yeah but it's better than smelling bad.
Hmm, I'll have to get some. My girlfriend is always telling me I have B.O.
